item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官为上海新店揭幕，彰显对中国的承诺
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）周四在上海市中心开设了一家规模宏大的新店，标志着该公司将中国作为市场和生产基地的承诺。【原文：Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook opened an expansive new store in central Shanghai Thursday, signaling his company’s commitment to China as a market and production base.】

item.title: 英国和澳大利亚选择 BAE 公司建造 Aukus 核潜艇舰队
item.description: 澳大利亚和英国选择国防制造商 BAE Systems Plc 和 ASC Pty Ltd 建造一支下一代核动力潜艇舰队，预计将于 2040 年代部署，这是《奥库斯安全条约》（Aukus security treaty）迈出的最新一步。【原文：Australia and the UK selected defense manufacturers BAE Systems Plc and ASC Pty Ltd to build a fleet of next generation nuclear-powered submarines that are expected to be deployed in the 2040s, the latest step in the Aukus security pact.】

item.title: 现金充裕的思科转为净负债，以实现增长和回报
item.description: 对于思科系统公司（Cisco Systems Inc. ）来说，280 亿美元收购 Splunk 公司不仅标志着其迄今为止最大的多元化努力，也标志着其向净债务资本地位的历史性转变，旨在促进增长和股东回报。【原文：For Cisco Systems Inc., the $28 billion acquisition of Splunk Inc. marks not only its biggest diversification effort to date but a historic shift to a net debt capital position designed to bolster growth and shareholder returns.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 IHC 计划明年将价值 270 亿美元的控股公司上市
item.description: 据阿布扎比最大的上市公司首席执行官称，这家由酋长国王室重要成员领导的公司正寻求在明年之前将一家价值超过 1000 亿迪拉姆（约合 270 亿美元）的控股公司上市。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s largest listed company, led by a key member of the emirate’s royal family, is looking to list a holding firm worth more than 100 billion dirhams ($27 billion) by next year, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: Signa 债权人要求对 7 亿美元失踪资金做出答复
item.description: 在周一支持了一项重组计划后，Signa Holding GmbH 旗下一家重要房地产公司的债券持有人仍在要求对一批价值约 6.75 亿欧元（约合 7.37 亿美元）的资金失踪一事做出答复。【原文：After backing a restructuring plan on Monday, bondholders of one of Signa Holding GmbH’s key property units are still demanding answers over a missing batch of funds worth around €675 million ($737 million.)】

item.title: 土耳其在投票前意外加息以稳定里拉汇率
item.description: 土耳其央行周四提高了利率，这一出人意料的决定恰好是在大选之前做出的，显示了在经历大跌之后支撑里拉的紧迫性。【原文：Turkey’s central bank raised interest rates on Thursday, a surprise decision just ahead of elections that shows the urgency of supporting the lira after a selloff.】

item.title: 私人信贷的违约恢复率低于最大竞争对手
item.description:
最新数据显示，违约后直接贷款的价值低于银团贷款。【原文：

New data shows direct loans are worth less after a default than syndicated loans.

】

item.title: 在阿根廷创纪录的互换交易中，交易员利用幽灵债券赚取了 20% 的利润
item.description: 一小部分精明的投资者在阿根廷创纪录的 500 亿美元地方债务置换中获得了 20% 的收益，尽管他们实际上并没有交出符合条件的债券。【原文：A small group of savvy investors made 20% gains in Argentina’s record $50 billion local debt swap despite not actually handing over eligible bonds.】

item.title: 中东顶级杂货连锁店 LuLu 据称将向银行申请 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，经营着中东最大连锁大卖场之一的 LuLu 集团国际公司已为今年海湾地区最大的首次公开募股之一指定了银行。【原文：LuLu Group International, which operates one of the Middle East’s largest hypermarket chains, has appointed banks for what could be one of the biggest initial public offerings in the Gulf this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储决议引发股市反弹并创下新纪录，人工智能热潮进一步升温，Reddit 将首次亮相。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The Fed’s decision sparks a rally and sends stocks to new records, the AI frenzy burnishes that further and Reddit is set to debut. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 特朗普媒体的大手笔 SPAC 交易将使盟友和敌人都受益匪浅
item.description: 如果这位前总统的媒体初创公司成为一家上市公司，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）并不是唯一一个将变得更富有的人--至少在纸面上是这样。【原文：Donald Trump isn’t the only one set to become a lot richer if the former president’s media startup debuts as a public company – at least on paper.】

item.title: 中国股市暴跌，中国平安利润意外下滑
item.description: 由于股市下跌损害了投资回报，中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司去年的利润出人意料地下降了 22.8%。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co.’s profit unexpectedly fell 22.8% last year as stock-market declines hurt investment returns.】

item.title: 分析师称瑞士央行 "显著 "降息后瑞士法郎将下滑
item.description: 在瑞士央行意外降息后，瑞郎可能继续承压，跌至八个月低点。【原文：The Swiss franc is likely to stay under pressure after a surprise interest-rate by the country’s central bank sent it tumbling to an eight-month low.】

item.title: 华尔街大佬分享疯狂三月心得
item.description: 每年到了这个时候，你都会做出 "疯狂三月 "的选择，并祈祷你的同事、朋友和家人比你更早 "玩完"。【原文：It’s that time of the year when you make your March Madness picks and pray that your colleagues, friends and family members flame out before you do.】

item.title: 法国 Altice 债权人正与 Houlihan 制定债务计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Altice France 的债权人包括 Attestor Capital 和 Arini，在与该公司进行债务谈判之前，已开始与顾问公司 Houlihan Lokey Inc.【原文：Altice France’s creditors including Attestor Capital and Arini have started working with advisers Houlihan Lokey Inc. and law firm Milbank LLP ahead of debt talks with the company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 空中客车公司在波音两大市场赢得宽体喷气机订单
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）从日本和韩国的旗舰航空公司获得了两份大订单，使这家欧洲制造商在传统上倾向于老对手波音公司的市场上取得了战略性胜利。【原文：Airbus SE secured two major orders from the flagship carriers of Japan and South Korea, giving the European manufacturer a strategic win in markets that have traditionally leaned toward arch-rival Boeing Co.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦航空公司私有化取得进展，收益扩大至 600
item.description: 随着政府出售国有航空公司的计划取得进展，巴基斯坦国际航空公司的股价创下历史新高。【原文：Shares of Pakistan International Airlines rallied to a record as the government’s bid to sell the state-owned carrier made progress.】

item.title: 华丽七重奏？更像是 "炽热二号 "和 "不温不火五号
item.description: 随着投资者对人工智能的关注，英伟达（Nvidia）和美达（Meta）与曾经炙手可热的其他公司拉开了差距。【原文：Nvidia and Meta have pulled away from the rest of the once-hot group as investors focus on AI.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡获得国际货币基金组织 3.37 亿美元贷款的初步批准
item.description: 在斯里兰卡努力完成债务重组之际，国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）30 亿美元救助计划的下一笔贷款获得了初步批准。【原文：Sri Lanka secured initial approval for the next loan tranche from a $3 billion International Monetary Fund bailout program, as the nation seeks to complete its debt restructuring.】

item.title: 土耳其黄金走私激增，与世界市场的差距日益扩大
item.description: 土耳其正面临着黄金走私激增的问题，因为人们试图从该国因进口上限而不断增长的国际市场溢价中获利。【原文：Turkey is facing a surge in gold smuggling as people seek to profit from the country’s growing premium to international markets due to a cap on imports.】

item.title: 日元为何如此疲软及其对日本的意义
item.description: 日元对美元汇率继续在历史低点附近徘徊，主要原因是日本的利率仍然远远低于美国和其他国家，从而削弱了日元的相对吸引力。即使在本周早些时候日本央行 17 年来首次提高利率之后，日元的下行压力依然存在。日元下跌对经济、企业和消费者既有利也有弊。日本的政策制定者们仍在警惕他们可能会对日元汇率造成影响。【原文：The yen has continued to languish near its historic low versus the dollar, mainly because interest rates in Japan remain much lower than those in the US and elsewhere, diminishing the currency’s relative allure. The downward pressure persists even after the Bank of Japan raised interest rates earlier this week for the first time in 17 years. The yen’s decline has both benefited and harmed the economy, businesses and consumers. Japanese policymakers remain on guard against the possibility they ma】

item.title: 挪威利率维持在 16 年高位，不急于很快降息
item.description: 2023年11月2日星期四，挪威奥斯陆，挪威央行行长艾达-沃尔登-巴切（Ida Wolden Bache）在利率新闻发布会上。挪威央行自1月份以来首次维持借贷成本不变，并重申了今年再加息一次的计划，因为疲软的克朗阻碍了挪威央行抑制通货膨胀的努力。摄影师弗雷德里克-索尔斯塔德/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Ida Wolden Bache, governor of Norges Bank, during an interest rates news conference in Oslo, Norway, on Thursday, Nov. 2, 2023. Norway's central bank held its borrowing costs unchanged for the first time since January and repeated a plan for one more interest-rate hike this year as a weak krone hampers Norges Bank’s efforts to rein in inflation. Photographer: Fredrik Solstad/Bloomberg】

item.title: 美联储的拖延使最后一英里变得更加艰难
item.description: 央行有可能在降息方面落后于曲线，造成不必要的痛苦。【原文：The central bank risks falling behind the curve on rate cuts, causing unnecessary pain.】

item.title: 阿联酋支持的交易失败，《国民世界》关注《电讯报
item.description: 约克郡邮报》和其他英国地方报纸背后的出版商 National World Plc 在阿联酋支持的竞购被英国政府有效阻止后，再次表示有意收购《每日电讯报》。【原文：National World Plc, the publisher behind the Yorkshire Post and other British local newspapers, has repeated its interest in buying the Telegraph after a UAE-backed bid was effectively blocked by the UK government.】

item.title: 空中客车公司与大韩航空达成 140 亿美元协议，波音公司被冷落
item.description: 大韩航空（Korean Air Lines Co. — typically the carrier's top aircraft supplier — ）放弃了陷入困境的波音公司（Boeing Co. — typically the carrier's top aircraft supplier — to order 33 Airbus SE A350 wide-body jets in a $14 billion deal as it seeks to streamline its fleet before a merger with Asiana Airlines Inc.【原文：Korean Air Lines Co. passed over embattled Boeing Co. — typically the carrier’s top aircraft supplier — to order 33 Airbus SE A350 wide-body jets in a $14 billion deal as it seeks to streamline its fleet ahead of a merger with Asiana Airlines Inc.】

item.title: 伊比利亚电力公司在新战略更新中加倍重视美国电网
item.description: Iberdrola SA 正在加强对电网的关注，将 60% 的新资金分配给 2026 年之前的电网项目。【原文：Iberdrola SA is strengthening its focus on power networks, allocating 60% of new funding to grid projects through 2026.】

item.title: 台湾出人意料地将关键利率上调至 2008 年以来最高水平
item.description: 台湾中央银行出人意料地将基准利率提高到 2008 年以来的最高点，同时加大力度应对顽固的通货膨胀，官员们警告说，这个芯片制造中心可能会面临价格的 "结构性变化"。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank unexpectedly raised its benchmark interest rate to the highest since 2008 as it ramped up efforts to tackle stubborn inflation with officials warning the chip-making hub could face a “structural shift” in prices.】

item.title: 菲律宾主要银行认为本国富裕人口不断增加
item.description: 菲律宾群岛银行是东南亚国家最大的贷款机构之一，该行预计，在经济强劲增长的推动下，菲律宾的百万富翁人口将继续增加。【原文：Bank of the Philippine Islands, one the Southeast Asian nation’s top lenders, expects the country’s millionaire population to continue rising, fueled by robust economic growth.】

item.title: 产量增长但石油价格下降导致中国石油集团利润下滑
item.description: 由于油价疲软超过了创纪录的产量，中国石油天然气股份有限公司（Cnooc Ltd. ）去年的年度利润有所下降。【原文：Cnooc Ltd. annual profits fell last year as weaker oil prices outweighed record production.】

item.title: 瑞士央行领先欧洲央行和美联储降息以遏制法郎升值
item.description: 瑞士国家银行将其关键利率下调了 25 个基点，在全球同行可能效仿之前几个月就采取了行动，因为政策制定者试图防止法郎上涨。【原文：The Swiss National Bank cut its key interest rate by 25 basis points, acting months before global peers may follow suit as policymakers try to prevent gains in the franc.】
